theHeart:Scab.NAME: Scab
theHeart:Scab.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, add 2 Wounds to your Hand.

theHeart:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theHeart:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theHeart:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theHeart:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theHeart:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theHeart:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theHeart:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theHeart:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theHeart:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theHeart:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theHeart:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theHeart:PainfulStabs.NAME: Painful Stabs
theHeart:PainfulStabs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Attack one more time for each Status cards in hand.

theHeart:Coagulation.NAME: Coagulation
theHeart:Coagulation.DESCRIPTION: Draw all Status cards in your draw pile.

theHeart:HeartAttack.NAME: Heart Attack
theHeart:HeartAttack.DESCRIPTION: Lose 20 hp, deal !D! to all enemies, Gain !M! energy, draw !M! cards.

theHeart:BloodSpray.NAME: BloodSpray
theHeart:BloodSpray.DESCRIPTION: Lose 4 HP. !D! damage to all enemies.

theHeart:TentacleWhip.NAME: TentacleWhip
theHeart:TentacleWhip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies, temporarily reduce !M! strength to all enemies.

theHeart:CapillaryExchange.NAME: CapillaryExchange
theHeart:CapillaryExchange.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card and place 1 card to the top of your deck, that cards now costs 0 until played.
theHeart:CapillaryExchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards and place 1 card to the top of your deck, that cards now costs 0 until played.

theHeart:ChaoticEnergy.NAME: ChaoticEnergy
theHeart:ChaoticEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Give !B! Block to player and enemies.

theHeart:Debilitate.NAME: Debilitate
theHeart:Debilitate.DESCRIPTION: Give !M! Weak, !M! Vulnerable, and Stun the enemy. Exhaust

theHeart:Devour.NAME: Devour
theHeart:Devour.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, gain !M! strength this combat if this kills an enemy.

theHeart:BloodClots.NAME: BloodClots
theHeart:BloodClots.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block every time you exhaust a Status card.

theHeart:HyperTrophy.NAME: HyperTrophy
theHeart:HyperTrophy.DESCRIPTION: Gain 200 max hp for the combat, take 3x more damage.

theHeart:MindScape.NAME: MindScape
theHeart:MindScape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage, NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.
theHeart:MindScape.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage, NL Put two cards from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

theHeart:BloodWall.NAME: BloodWall
theHeart:BloodWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, Gain block = to last damage taken in this combat.

theHeart:Embolism.NAME: Embolism
theHeart:Embolism.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, add 2 Wounds to your draw pile, and reduce draw by !M!.

theHeart:HeartBurn.NAME: HeartBurn
theHeart:HeartBurn.DESCRIPTION: Apply 11 poison to enemy, apply 4 poison to self.
theHeart:HeartBurn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 14 poison to enemy, apply 3 poison to self.

theHeart:Constrict.NAME: Constrict
theHeart:Constrict.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Constrict to an enemy. Exhaust

theHeart:Pacemaker.NAME: Pacemaker
theHeart:Pacemaker.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play One Reprogram.

theHeart:Hemorrhage.NAME: Hemorrhage
theHeart:Hemorrhage.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 extra card per turn, add 1 wound to your discard pile per turn.

theHeart:ArterialFlow.NAME: ArterialFlow
theHeart:ArterialFlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, draw !M! cards, add 1 Wound to your draw pile.

theHeart:Invincibility.NAME: Invincibility
theHeart:Invincibility.DESCRIPTION: Cap damage taken in a single turn to !M! damage.

theHeart:Cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
theHeart:Cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Remove all debuffs from self, Gain !B! Block

theHeart:Toil.NAME: Toil
theHeart:Toil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! energy this turn, lose !M! energy next turn

theHeart:Embolectomy.NAME: Embolectomy
theHeart:Embolectomy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Status Cards in your discard pile. Exhaust.
theHeart:Embolectomy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Status Cards in your discard and draw pile. Exhaust.

theHeart:EndlessHatred.NAME: EndlessHatred
theHeart:EndlessHatred.DESCRIPTION: When a status card exhausts deal !M! to all enemies.

theHeart:CardiacRupture.NAME: Cardiac Rupture
theHeart:CardiacRupture.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! hp every time you play a card. All cards cost zero, when you play a card remove it from combat and add a wound to hand.

theHeart:QuantumEntanglement.NAME: Quantum Entanglement
theHeart:QuantumEntanglement.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage, damage is equal to enemy intent  .

theHeart:Crumble.NAME: Crumble
theHeart:Crumble.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage  = to x!M! enemy block

theHeart:TranquilRhythm.NAME: TranquilRhythm
theHeart:TranquilRhythm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block, Apply  !M! Regen and  !theHeart:SecondMagic! Weaken.

theHeart:NoxiousBlood.NAME: Noxious Blood
theHeart:NoxiousBlood.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! poison to Self and ALL enemies.

theHeart:GrayPlatelets.NAME: GrayPlatelets
theHeart:GrayPlatelets.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose hp apply !M! poison to ALL enemies.

theHeart:Tachycardia.NAME: Tachycardia
theHeart:Tachycardia.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to all enemies, gain !M! energy next turn, add a Void to your discard pile.

theHeart:Hemoblastosis.NAME: Hemoblastosis
theHeart:Hemoblastosis.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Hp and deal !D! in 2 turns.

theHeart:LeechSeed.NAME: LeechSeed
theHeart:LeechSeed.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! regen to self and !M! poison to enemy. Exhaust.

theHeart:AntiCoagulant.NAME: AntiCoagulant
theHeart:AntiCoagulant.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Status cards in hand, Gain !M! energy and draw for every card exhausted

theHeart:Cholesterol.NAME: Cholesterol
theHeart:Cholesterol.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! hp, and add !theHeart:SecondMagic! Slimed to your hand. Exhaust.

theHeart:ElementalCharge.NAME: ElementalCharge
theHeart:ElementalCharge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust X cards in hand, Add X burns, Deal !D! damage X times.

theHeart:ScrapOoze.NAME: ScrapOoze
theHeart:ScrapOoze.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Lose !M! hp when you draw this card and Gain !B! Block. When Exhausted gain !M! Block.

theHeart:Wrath.NAME: Wrath
theHeart:Wrath.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage = to damage taken this combat.

theHeart:HyperCoagulation.NAME: HyperCoagulation
theHeart:HyperCoagulation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !B! Block.This card gains !M! Block and Damage for every status card in combat. You have !theHeart:StatusCardsNumber! status cards.

theHeart:Cyroablation.NAME: Cyroablation
theHeart:Cyroablation.DESCRIPTION: gain !B! Block and exhaust a card from your hand.

theHeart:Enrage.NAME: Enraged
theHeart:Enrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies, lose !M! strength. .

theHeart:CorruptedForm.NAME: Corrupted Form
theHeart:CorruptedForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status Card, Gain !M! Strength, At the end of the turn lose !M! strength..

theHeart:Hypertension.NAME: Hypertension
theHeart:Hypertension.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and heal for damage dealt. Add 2 Void to your discard pile.

theHeart:AdaptiveCells.NAME: Adaptive Cells
theHeart:AdaptiveCells.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Status, draw !M! cards.

theHeart:Omega3.NAME: Omega-3
theHeart:Omega3.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal, Gain !B! Block, Gain 1 Dex this turn, Lose 1 Dex at the end of this turn.

theHeart:Terrify.NAME: Terrify
theHeart:Terrify.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose 6 Strength this turn.

theHeart:TotalHeartFailure.NAME: Total Heart Failure
theHeart:TotalHeartFailure.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and Retain your hand for !M! turns, You can not draw or block for !M! turns.

theHeart:Arrhythmia.NAME: Arrhythmia
theHeart:Arrhythmia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block this turn, gain !theHeart:SecondMagic! Block next turn.

theHeart:FattyMembrane.NAME: FattyMembrane
theHeart:FattyMembrane.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !theHeart:SecondMagic! Block for every status card in your hand, draw, discard, and exhaust pile. You have !theHeart:StatusCardsNumber! status cards.

theHeart:Antibiotics.NAME: Antibiotics
theHeart:Antibiotics.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary hp and !theHeart:SecondMagic! temporary hp based on number of Status Cards.

theHeart:OxygenRichBlood.NAME: OxygenRichBlood
theHeart:OxygenRichBlood.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and add a wound to your draw pile.

theHeart:PoisonousCyst.NAME: PoisonousCyst
theHeart:PoisonousCyst.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! total poison, this card gains !theHeart:SecondMagic! poison to the enemy for every status cards in combat. You have !theHeart:StatusCardsNumber! status cards.
